QuestData.Title: Children of Ursoc
QuestData.Description: The furbolgs of Grizzly Hills carry with them a corruption of some kind, that is for sure. Tribal war has broken out amongst them after years of peaceful coexistence.$B$BWhat remains to be seen is whether the bears they worship as gods have also been tainted.$B$BUrsoc's two children, Orsonn and Kodian, dwell in the Heart's Blood Shrine and the Rage Fang Shrine, south and southeast of Grizzlemaw.$B$BSee if they will speak to you regarding what has happened here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to speak to Orsonn at the Rage Fang Shrine and Kodian at the Heart's Blood Shrine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you spoken to Orsonn and Kodian yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Ursoc's children are wise. Their words explain much of what we've seen so far.
